wikipedia_page.main: Ernest James Stewart Michie (7 November 1933 – 13 November 2021) was a Scottish international rugby union player, who played for Scotland and the Lions. He played at Lock and his nickname was "Fourteen". He weighed 14 stone.

response: * Ernie Michie, , British and Irish Lions, Barbarian F.C.McLaren, p81
